text: Blairsville is an unincorporated community in York County, in the U.S. state of South Carolina. ==History== The community was named after the local Blair family. A post office called Blairsville was established in 1815, and remained in operation until 1903. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in South Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in York County, South Carolina
title: Blairsville, South Carolina
